ygData.subject: Archery training
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow Paladins, I was wondering how all of you were faring with archery skill advancement?  At 10th level, sinking 1 training point into archery, then
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow Paladins,

I was wondering how all of you were faring with archery skill advancement? At
10th level, sinking 1 training point into archery, then using 20 arrows with a
cheap hunting bow I have yet to see my skill increase. I purchased a tiny
dagger from a friendly enchanter, but found that I can't equip it. My next
thought is to either purchase a lot of arrows (100) and use the bow as much as
possible or to "jump start" the archery skill by putting 5 more training points
into it. Any feedback or opinions?

Kaladin, the 'range 50' Paladin
--
